```sh
      alias conn="netstat -plant | grep '80\|443' | grep -v LISTEN | wc -l" 

```

```sh
      alias conn="echo 'Total connections on port 80 and 443:' ; netstat -plant | grep '80\|443' | grep -v LISTEN | wc -l" 

```
